headline: Putting it all together, my CSV row should look like this: "El loco del martillo"
author: La Seño María
content: Hoy en día, uno pensaría que... Estoy feliz porque.... I need to make sure each field is enclosed in double quotes and separated by semicolons. Also, no extra semicolons inside the fields—only commas if needed.

headline: El loco del martillo
author: La Seño María
content: Hoy en día, uno pensaría que...
